note:
I'm a techie who loves new gadgets and books. I'm also a big fan of Mastodon, a decentralized social media platform that values privacy and freedom of expression. I believe that Mastodon is the future of social media, and I'm excited to be a part of it.

I'm always looking for new ways to use technology to improve my life, and I'm always up for a good discussion about books or technology. If you're interested in learning more about Mastodon or just want to chat, feel free to follow me.
